alert.note: Alert for Clark; Coles; Edgar (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Central Illinois (Central and East Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued March 06 at 1:00AM CST until March 06 at 1:45AM CST by NWS Central Illinois
info.description: The National Weather Service in Lincoln has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Coles County in east central Illinois... Southern Edgar County in east central Illinois... Northern Clark County in east central Illinois... * Until 145 AM CST. * At 100 AM CST, a severe thunderstorm was located near Charleston, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Westfield around 110 AM CST. Martinsville around 115 AM CST. Clarksville around 120 AM CST. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Marshall, Oliver, Dennison and Vermilion. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 137 and 154. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
